projectGridLines.description:
Project

1

Title: Equity New Product Development using Quantitative Research and Data analysis

Description: This role provides exposure to the passive investing revolution rocking the world of

finance. You will also get exposure to cutting edge concepts in ESG, Climate and Impact investing trying

to make planet a better place. As an intern you will support the NPD team by using Python and SQL in

building state of the art capabilities in areas such as portfolio construction, analytics, and data

visualization. You will perform analytics on research data and portfolios and will support a global team of

senior experts in Quantitative research who are tech and math geeks with world class credentials and

from the best institutions all over the world. These experts develop and support sophisticated portfolios

underlying financial products with billions of USD as AUM.

Skill sets: Basic knowledge of Python/ SQL, Basic knowledge of Finance, Statistical analysis, Data

Analytics, Portfolio analysis, Quantitative Aptitude

Expected learning: Portfolio Management concepts, Equity portfolio analysis, Investment analysis,

Quantitative Finance, Statistics, Data Analysis

Specific courses required for project execution

Preferably from regular B.E.(Hons) program with some exposure to economics.
